idea-plugin.name: Mdx Daemon
idea-plugin.description: Boost your IDE development productivity with background builds powered by the MDX Daemon. This plugin automatically runs background work as need to boost developer productivity. Features: • Smart background build triggering • Fine-grained job controls • Works out of the box — no configuration required Learn more: GitHub
idea-plugin.change-notes: Initial public release: • Integrates with the MDX Daemon for background Gradle builds • Supports execute and cancel operations per job • Reads feature flags from local/global Gradle properties
